data.text:
Martin Lawrence is a television personality, actor, screenwriter, producer and comedian who rose to fame in the 1990s when he embarked on a successful acting career in Hollywood. The best of Martin Lawrence is evident in his eponymous television sitcom, Martin and in the films House Party, A Thin Line Between Love and Hate, Boomerang, Big Momma’s House, Bad Boys, Life, Wild Hogs, Blue Streak, and Nothing . to lose

Before discovering his exceptional talent in comedic comedy, the multi-talented star had a great passion for boxing as a teenager. However, the comedy streak lay dormant within him, just waiting for the right opportunity. When one of his school teachers pushed him to attend a mic night at a local comedy club, it felt like an opportunity to get in touch with readiness. born.

Martin Lawrence Biography, Age

Martin Fitzgerald Lawrence was born in Frankfurt, Germany on April 16, 1965. The budding comedian, along with five other siblings, was abandoned by their military father; his mother, Chlora, had to engage in extra work to care for the family. Martin’s first and middle names come from the late civil rights activist Martin Luther King and a former US President John Fitzgerald Kennedy. He had his high school education at Eleanor Roosevelt High School.

The actor’s multifaceted career kicked off from comedy when he made an appearance on the TV show titled What Happens Now! He then landed the job of host of Def Comedy Jam, a breakthrough HBO show, thanks to his performance on What Happens Now!. Subsequently, the famous comedian began his personal sitcom for Fox known as Martin and it was on the air from 1992 to 1997. After comedy, Martins moved on to acting, film production and writing .

Who is Martin Lawrence Wife? Kids

Martin Lawrence has been married twice in his life, and on both occasions the marriages ended in divorce. His first foray into marriage was in 1995 when the hilarious comedian married Patricia Southall, a former Miss Virginia in the United States. The two had a daughter named Jasmine Page who was born on January 15, 1996. Unfortunately, they started having marital problems and divorced in 1997.

The same year, Martins started a relationship with Shamicka Gibbs and on July 10th , 2010, they tied the knot at Martin’s house in Beverly Hills. Several Hollywood celebrities such as Denzel Washington and Eddie Murphy were among the 120 guests who celebrated the occasion, where famous R&B star Shanice performed.

Martin’s marriage to Shamicka was blessed with two children; Iyanna Faith, born November 9, 2000 and second daughter, Amara Trinity, born August 20, 2002. Once again, the marriage did not last long and the couple ended up divorcing. Prior to his two marriages, the famous actor-comedian was engaged to actress Lark Voorhies in 1993.

Size weight

The star of Mom’s Big House isn’t a very big actor; he is an average build man who stands at an average height of 1.71m (5′ 7½”) and his weight is listed at 74kg. Details of the comedian’s other body stats are not available at this time.

Net value

Martin Lawrence wrote his name in the sands of time as one of the big names in the entertainment industry. Over the years, he’s amassed an impressive net worth of $110 million from salaries earned from several movies, including 1997’s Nothing to Lose, which earned him a whopping $6 million. The movie Life made him $8.5 million in 1999. Then in 2001, What’s the Worst That Can Happen? and Dark Knight increased his earnings by $13 million and $16.5 million respectively and in 2003, the hilarious comedian earned $20 million each on National Security and Bad Boys II.

Is Martin Lawrence dead?

Careful monitoring of current trends has revealed that celebrity death hoaxes are on the rise and in March 2015, Martin Lawrence fell victim to one of these hoaxes with his death being published on several websites. A report that this multi-talented entertainer was found dead in an LA hotel room has appeared on the Elite Jamaica website, NewsBuzzDaily.com and other trend-driven websites from NewsBuzzDaily.com.

The death hoax report had that the American comedian and actor’s body was discovered in his hotel room when he failed to leave the hotel at the scheduled time. This rumor was denied by Martin himself, who continued to be active on social media long after his death. For his part, the versatile entertainer took off on his death prank on social media with a message that he was on his way back for an exclusive.
